description:
Unmatched for efficiency on fixed lines, this compact ascender doesn't interfere with progression. Use the Croll Chest Ascender L with a Basic ascender or with an Ascension handled ascender for rope ascents.

  • Aluminum frame with a nylon trigger
  • Stainless steel cam with angled teeth is self cleaning, and secure on muddy or icy ropes
  • Steel cam and wear plate are designed for durability
  • Lower hole is angled to keep the chest ascender flat
  • Upper hole for attaching a shoulder strap and keeping the ascender in position
  • Not intended for situations such as self belay where it can be shock loaded
name: Petzl Croll Chest Ascender L
